Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it contradicts the statement made by President Obama regarding the approval of more than 35 new offshore drilling permits.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there have been more than one new drilling permit approved during the Obama administration.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the number of new drilling permits is the sole measure of the Obama administration's energy policy.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the low number of new drilling permits, such as the implementation of new safety and environmental requirements after the Deepwater Horizon incident.
